backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining data types (Episode, Character, Clan, GalleryItem, NewsPost, Script, ProBlockData, FanMailMessage, Badge, UserBadge, CollaborationRequest, SupportRequest) and state management with mixins for authorization and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend components including hero section, clans, characters, badges, gallery, navigation, and various interactive features with styling details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining color tokens for UI components and design system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with basic structure, viewport meta tag, and script reference to main.tsx.

frontend/src/data/badges.ts: Badge data definitions including BadgeDefinition and UserBadge types, sample badge definitions for clan loyalty and character matches with rarity levels, and utility functions to query badges by ID, rarity, or unlock type.

frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages backend actor instances with identity-based authentication, initializes access control with admin token from URL params, and invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBadgeUnlockNotific: Empty file for badge unlock notification hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication providing login/logout functionality, identity state management, auth client creation with configurable options, and status tracking throughout the authentication lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Empty file for parallax scroll effect hook.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Empty file for reduced motion preference detection hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for admin authorization checks including useIsCallerAdmin and useGetCallerUserRole, both dependent on actor availability.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: Empty file for scroll reveal animation hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, plus custom utility classes for glowing effects, animations (float, pulse-glow, destiny-reveal), and glassmorphism panels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient provider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/types/fanArtCommunity.ts: Empty TypeScript type definition file for fan art community features.
Empty utility file intended for admin content adaptation logic.
frontend/src/utils/badgeStorage.ts: LocalStorage utilities for persisting unlocked badge IDs across sessions, including functions to save, load, check, unlock, and clear badge progress.
frontend/src/utils/badgeUnlockLogic.ts: Empty utility file intended for badge unlock logic implementation.
frontend/src/utils/galleryImageUpload.ts: Empty utility file intended for gallery image upload functionality.
frontend/src/utils/passwordHash.ts: Empty utility file intended for password hashing (marked for removal in project_state.json).
frontend/src/utils/signupStorage.ts: Empty utility file intended for signup storage (marked for removal in project_state.json).
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL parameter parsing utilities supporting both standard query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and functions to extract, store, retrieve, and clear parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH-based color system for theming (including clan colors), custom shadows with glow effects, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file documenting a feature removal task to eliminate account setup functionality including SignupModal component, signup/password utilities from frontend, and UserProfile authentication from backend.
